import React from "react"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/AuthContext"; import { Users, FileText, CheckCircle, Clock, Award, Briefcase } from "lucide-react"; const stats = [ { name: "Total Surveys", value: "12", icon: FileText, change: "+4.75%", changeType: "positive", color: "from-blue-500 to-indigo-600", }, { name: "Active Users", value: "24", icon: Users, change: "+2.02%", changeType: "positive", color: "from-green-400 to-emerald-600", }, { name: "Completed Tasks", value: "156", icon: CheckCircle, change: "+10.18%", changeType: "positive", color: "from-purple-500 to-pink-600", }, { name: "Pending Tasks", value: "8", icon: Clock, change: "-1.39%", changeType: "negative", color: "from-orange-400 to-red-600", }, ]; const quickActions = [ { name: "Complete Profile", icon: Award, color: "bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-700" }, { name: "View Tasks", icon: CheckCircle, color: "bg-green-100 text-green-700" }, { name: "Upcoming Events", icon: Clock, color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-700" }, { name: "Team Members", icon: Users, color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700" }, { name: "Training Modules", icon: Briefcase, color: "bg-red-100 text-red-700" }, ]; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

Here's an overview of your onboarding progress and activities

{stats.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.value}
{item.change} from last month
))}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map((action) => ( ))}

Your Onboarding Progress

Overall Progress 65%

You're making great progress! Complete your remaining tasks to finish your onboarding journey.

); }; export default Dashboard;
